title: How the PS5 Works with PS4 Games - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.09.20
description:
Hurry to http://upstart.com/kfgames to find out HOW
LOW your Upstart rate can be!

Go to http://getquip.com/GAMES right now to get your first refill FREE!

Head to http://brooklinen.com and use promo code games to get 10% off your first order!

The Busiest Lady in the Business Andrea Rene joins Greg to talk about PS5 backwards compatibility, Avengers updates, and xCloud on iOS!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:50 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Black Jack, Tom Bock
The Roper Report   -
00:05:30 - HOW THE PS5 WORKS WITH PS4 GAMES
00:10:10 -  Sony have published their list of incompatible games (see the push square article) and it is tiny!  - Best Friends Q:Aidan
00:19:25 - Only select games get enhancements? Wouldn't this be the time to combat Xbox's major press over the past 2 weeks of EVERY game on the Series X just runs better? Why leave this glaring omission out, when with just the NVME hard drive, load times should be very minimal? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:21:35 - Avengers Message to Bored Players, Mike Fahey @ Kotaku
00:33:15 - xCloud on iPhone?! Ashley Stewart @ Business Insider
00:36:10 - No DLC, Quest Version for Squadrons, David Jagneaux @ UploadVR
00:39:45 - DAH FUTUREEEEEEE
00:45:00 -  UPSTART 
00:46:45 -  QUIP 
00:47:59 -  BROOKLINEN 
00:49:20 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:52:00 -  Why do you think Microsoft and Sony have such muted messaging on launch window releases? - Mattypoo
00:55:00 - Squad Up:Kessel(PS4) - Kesselwinks
00:56:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
MONDAY 10/12: Greg and Mario Rivera (ree-vera)
TUESDAY 10/13:  Tim and Janet Garcia
WEDNESDAY 10/14: Greg and Danny Pena (Pen-ya)
THURSDAY 10/15: Blessing and SanchoWest
FRIDAY 10/16: Greg and Elaine Gomez

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
